description: A student at Kashima high school and is a classmate of Hazumu`s in their second year. Ayuki is good friends with Tomari, and Ayuki will often give her, and others, advice and help in regards to relationships. Keeping with her stance on watching from afar, Ayuki continuously observes the ongoing development of the love triangle between Hazumu, Yasuna, and Tomari.
name: Mari Ayuki
